item.description: Version changed

item.title: Ticket #1437 (wp_get_links does not properly return on echo=0) created
item.dc:creator: Kafkaesqui
item.description: When passing wp_get_links() the argument 'echo=0', nothing is returned. Need to return the get_links() line at the end of the wp_get_links function.

item.title: Ticket #1423 (Outgoing pingbacks broken) updated
item.dc:creator: dlature
item.description:
Keywords, Priority, Version changed

Same as fzelders, cannot send nor do I record incoming pings. 1.5.2 in use.

I am investigating going to WP to help me with my spam problems in MT for trackbacks. MT Blacklist has stopped working for 3.x versions of MT on Windows Servers, and SpamLookup loads but does not operate, and seemingly no response from SpamLookup trouble tickets.

What's wrong with WP trackbacks? I definitely want that feature available.

item.title: Ticket #1436 (style confict with kubrick and hReview) created
item.dc:creator: ryansking
item.description:
As described ​here, there's a style conflict with kubrick and hReview. I've created a patch that should fix the conflict without effecting other kubrick use.

The patch is available ​here.

item.dc:creator: markjaquith
item.description: line 85 in options.php uses this function (which does not work at all), so we should get this fixed.

item.title: Ticket #1423 (Outgoing pingbacks broken) updated
item.dc:creator: fzelders
item.description:
From the moment I upgraded from 1.5 experiencing problems: I can NOT sent NEITHER receive trackbacks. Up till version 1.5 it worked fine.

a) I made no changes to the WordPress settings, b) Location of weblog not changed (same folder, same provider)

PLEASE HELP! because this is very disappointing for me!
